name: Engblogs
desc: Wanted an IOS version of engblogs.dev developed by @ishan0102.

name: source.css
desc: Got tired of trying to styles websites manually, wanted a consistent theme I can use across my projects.

name: Snippets
desc: I got tired of searching for the same snippets over and over again, so I decided to make chrome extension to keep them all in one place.

name: Flatter.page
desc: My custom react component library that I use for code blocks

name: x86 Processor in Structural Verilog
desc: A structural verilog implementation of the x86 processor using a subset of the x86 instruction set. Unironically the hardest project I've ever done.

name: Pictionary
desc: Play a game of pictionary with an AI.

name: Commentary
desc: Sentiment analysis of a tweet. Not the sentiment of the tweet, but the sentiment of the replies.

name: Algo Coffee
desc: A simple place where I write down some interesting things

name: Vault
desc: An Emulated Shell with basic shell like functionality where I keep some interesting discoveries.

name: MergePad
desc: A web based collaborative code editor that uses Automerge (CRDT) to resolve simultaneous conflicts.

name: Markdown Slides
desc: A web based slide editor/renderer that uses markdown for quick and easy editing

name: MOS
desc: A Hobby Operating System built for x86 that was inspired after completing the PINTOS labs done in my Operating Systems.

name: Ascii Diagrams
desc: A web based app that generates ascii diagram based on a simple markup style input.

name: This Website
desc: This website is built using React an Material UI and the Parallax is built using React. This gives a quick overview of my UT life.

name: Hack TX
desc: A NLP app built using React that that uses Google's NLP engine that gives feedback to help students with job inteviews.

name: Vemno Automation
desc: Built using ElectronJS and Python that allows you to send a large scale transaction using a spreadsheet to multiple users
